sentence.Network_en: This age-old struggle for control had led to untold bloody wars.
sentence.Network_cn: 这场由来已久的对控制权的争夺已经引发了无数流血的战争。

sentence.Network_en: An Olympic gold medal can lead to untold riches for an athlete.
sentence.Network_cn: 一枚奥运金牌能给运动员带来无尽的财富。

sentence.Network_en: Chemical seepage has caused untold damage.
sentence.Network_cn: 化学品泄漏已造成不可估量的损失。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English unteald 'not counted' (see un-, told)

encyclopedia.content: 日本新晋潮牌UNTOLD的创始人曾根和广～曾任职于日本的STUSSY社～ 2000年成立自己的牌子UNTOLD～ 对于UNTOLD这个牌子，可能很多人都不太了解，大家可以将这个品牌的单品与visvim划上等号。无论从设计风格还是素材质地，都有异曲同工之处；而价位则比visvim要低一些，基本是在visvim与HEAD PORTER PLUS之间的水准吧。

entry.tran: （强调糟糕或令人不快的程度）无以名状的，难以估量的
entry.def: You can use untold to emphasize how bad or unpleasant something is.

example.ex: The demise of the industry has caused untold misery to thousands of hard-working tradesmen...
example.tran: 该行业的没落给数以千计辛苦经营的商贩带来了难言的苦楚。

example.ex: This might do untold damage to her health.
example.tran: 这也许会给她的健康带来难以估量的伤害。

entry.tran: 数不胜数的;不计其数的
entry.def: You can use untold to emphasize that an amount or quantity is very large, especially when you are not sure how large it is.

example.tran: 该国数不清的钓鱼爱好者
赚取巨额财富的美好前景

auth_sentence.content: No event, however boring, is left untold.
auth_sentence.res_content: No event, however boring, is left untold.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No event, however boring, is left untold.

auth_sentence.content: John F. Kennedy died with his secrets untold.
auth_sentence.res_content: John F. Kennedy died with his secrets untold.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: John F. Kennedy died with his secrets untold.

auth_sentence.content: Untold numbers of travelers were stranded amid thousands of canceled flights.
auth_sentence.res_content: Untold numbers of travelers were stranded amid thousands of canceled flights.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Untold numbers of travelers were stranded amid thousands of canceled flights.

sentences.cn: 这是一个未曾泄露的秘密。

means.word_mean: 数不清的, 无数的, 无限的

sentences.en: She has done untold damage to our chances.
sentences.cn: 她给我们的机遇造成了不可估量的损害。

means.word_mean: 未说过的, 未透露的, 未加以叙述的

sentences.cn: 她的经历至今未对外介绍过。
